activationFirstStepText: Select an option to activate to receive electronic check services.
activateForCompany: Activation for companies I am a signatory to
selectACompany: Select a company from the list below.
activationSecondStepText: The signature request has been sent to you. To confirm and sign, go to Hamoon software and confirm the correctness of the information.
dontRecieveMessage: Have you not received a message in Hamon?
reciveOptText: To register a check, after receiving the 6-digit code, enter it in the box below.
sendAgainAlertSuccessText: The signature request has been sent to you. To confirm and sign, go to Hamoon software.
infoCheckText: Input The Informations For The Check
selectSignatureText: To sign a check, you can act as a single signatory. Otherwise, select the signatories.
mySignatureSubText: You can sign it as a sole signatory
selectSignatureGroupSubText: Select a group or groups of signers
signatureGroupText: Select a single signature or a group of signatures.
draggableListText: You can move people by using the icon on the right side of each person.
notEmptyActivationCodeText: Activation Code must have a value
failedToGetDateFromStoreText: There is no data. please try again
IdmaxLengthErrorText: National ID or Universal ID should not be less than 13 character
IdminLengthErrorText: National ID or Universal ID should not be equal or more than 10 character
maxlengthamount: Amount should not be more than 13 character
maxlengthdescription: Amount should not be more than 250 character
checkListsMenuText: Select the desired category to display the list of checks.
othersChecksSubtitle: Checks that you represent or sign.
selectActionText: For the desired check, choose an option from the operations below
addNewReceiversText: Add the list of new recipients of the intended check.
transferOtpText: To transfer the check, after receiving the 6-digit code, enter it in the box below.
Waiting for the receiver's approval in w: Waiting for the receiver's approval in withdrawing the check
Waiting for the recipient's confirmation: Waiting for the recipient's confirmation on the transfer of the check
The check is blocked in the system in ra: The check is blocked in the system in raw form (not registered).
confirmOrRejectTransferText: After checking the information, choose the desired operation.
thereIsNoChecksToShow: There is no checks to show
deactivationModalText: If confirmed, the client will be disabled.
noCheckInfo: There is no information of check
accountselectCashingHelperText: The account to which you want the desired amount to be deposited
dateCashingHelperText: The check will be received on the date you want.
openingAccountStepsText: To create an Agricultural Bank account, you need the following items
IdentificationSub: Access to the camera to record
personalInfoPageTitleText: Select your account type and enter your information.
notEmptymobileText: The mobile number cannot be empty.
notEmptynationalCodeSerialText: National card series cannot be empty.
notEmptynationalCodeText: The national code cannot be empty.
notEmptybirthDateText: Date of birth cannot be empty.
notEmptyidentityIssueDateText: The issue date cannot be empty.
otpPageTitleText: The activation code has been sent to your number. Please enter it in the box below after receiving it.
otpSendAgainSuccess: The activation code has been sent again.
obligationTitle: Letter of commitment to open an account at the Bank of Agriculture
acceptObligation: I have read and accepted the terms and conditions.
branchSelectTitleText: Choose the nearest branch to your place of residence.
requestCardMenuTitle: Card issuance and receipt by post
refuseCardMenuTitle: I do not want to receive a card
refuseCardMenuSubTitle: A physical card will not be issued to you.
requestCardText: If you want to receive a card, choose an option.
CardTypesSelectText: Select the type of card you want.
nationalImagePageTitleText: Dear subscriber, the photo of the original national card is accepted. Please place your national card in the frame close by.
takePictureHintText: Please make your phone horizontal when taking pictures.
endPageSuccessText: Dear subscriber, your request to open an account has been successfully registered. The result will be notified by SMS
nationalCardHomePageTitle: Smart national card or smart national card application receipt
cameraAccessHomePageTitle: Access to the camera, white background and Having proper coverage
noVoiceHomePageTitle: Being in a quiet environment to record sound
hijabHomePageTitle: It is not possible to open an account for people who are ineligible, B.E.D., or have bounced checks or bank debt
penHomePageTitle: Pen (black or blue) and white paper
selectCardPageTitleText: Choose a plan for your bank card.
backButtonText: If approved, you will return to the first page.
initErrorText: there is a problem with loading the app, please try later
